Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute at Madison/Lockwood
ShortDescription: #20 Madison buses are temp rerouted in both directions via Madison, Laramie, Washington, Central and Madison, due to police activity near Madison/Lockwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Madison, Laramie, Washington, Central and Madison, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near Madison/Lockwood.

Allow extra travel time.
